name: This Calling "Witness The Fall" CD
description:
DESCRIPTION: The debut full length album by Altoona metal rockers This Calling. This full color CD ships in a slim jewel case with full color artwork and liner notes. TRACK LISTING:
  1. Witness The Fall
  2. Let Me Breathe
  3. Taste of Victory
  4. This Calling
  5. Disguise*
  6. The Day I Died
  7. 1000 Words
  8. Found My Way
  9. My Turning Point
  10. Killbox**
PRODUCT DETAILS:
  • Format: Audio CD
  • Release Date: June 1, 2009
  • Label: Heartless Mockery Records
  • SKU: HMR-010
  • NOTES: * Disguise lyrics by Chad Carothers, ** Killbox lyrics by Steve Danfelt.

    Visit This Band’s Official Website

name: Suicide Switch "Killing The Memory" CD
description:
DESCRIPTION: The long anticipated release from area metal-core pioneers Suicide Switch... This full color disc ships in a slim jewel case with full color 2 panel artwork and liner notes. TRACK LISTING:
  1. Trust No One
  2. Conflicted
  3. Last Rights
  4. Say Goodbye
  5. Someone
  6. Unbreakable
  7. Hide
  8. [bonus] full length live set

  • SKU: HMR-008
  • Notes: Explicit Lyrics

name: Chapter 5 "A Great Day To Die" CD
description:
DESCRIPTION: The latest and greatest from the longtime kings of local punk meets hardcore Chapter 5. The disc features 8 all new original songs including the first single Hollow Song. This CD ships in a full color sleeve with artwork by vocalist/bassist Tim Mort, who is also a tattoo artist at Custom Skin Art in Altoona, PA. TRACK LISTING:
  1. Inside Out
  2. Buried
  3. Hollow Song
  4. Self Inflicted
  5. Compromised
  6. Same Old Thing
  7. The Only Way
  8. Stand Alone
PRODUCT DETAILS:
  • Format: Audio CD
  • Release Date: May 18, 2007
  • Label: Heartless Mockery Records
  • Also Available: Digital Download
  • SKU: HMR-006
  • Notes: Explicit Lyrics

Visit This Band’s Official Website
